111.title: Teacher

1112.content:
It's the last class of the last day before Winter Break. You and some friends have been shooting spitballs at each other over the past week. The spitball war has drawn down, but you still have your shooter on you. Being in your last class for just over two weeks might be nice if it weren't for the fact that Miss Williams is you hardest teacher. When you first saw her you expected her to be a pushover, she seemed too young and too attractive to be strict. you couldn't have been more wrong. It didn't help that you felt incredibly awkward in her class because you normally got a boner just looking at her.

Like all Friday's Miss Williams gave your class a test. You like most of the class finished the test with a whole 20 minutes left in class. As you sat in your seat bored you realized that Miss Williams was intent on her computer and everyone else was either reading or day dreaming. This is the perfect time to mess with her. You pull out your launcher, make a spitball and launch it directly in her cleavage. She pops up, but you get you launcher away in time. Feeling victorious, the rest of the time flies. Before you know it the bell rings and you can go home.

"John, I need to talk to you." She can't know, you put it away in time.

"Yes ma'am." Once the rest of the class has left you walk up to her.

"I can't believe that you did that, you're normally a hassle, but that was something else."

"I did what?" Maybe if I play dumb, I can get away with it.

"We both know what you did. If you want to play, I can just get the security camera footage, but to do that I would have to tell the principle, at which point the situation will be out of both of our hands. So what did you do?"

She has you, "I shot a spitball at your tits."

"You aimed at my tits? I was going to try to just tell you off but this is big." Shit, this doesn't sound good. "This is blatant sexual harassment, do you want to get expelled." Your mom has paid major money for this school, she would kill you if you got expelled. "I might even sue you for this shit."

This has gotten so far out of control, "Please, I'll do anything."

"I might have an idea, let me just check it with your mother, step outside for a bit."

You step outside and try, in vain, to listen to what she is saying. After what feels like forever she calls you back in.

"I've spoken with your mother and I'm going to try an original punishment with you."
1112.title: You shot a spitball into her cleavage.

11121.content:
"You'll be coming with me to my house. Get your stuff and meet me in the faculty parking lot."

What could be going on, the possibilities run through your mind as you grab your stuff from your locker. Once you have all of your stuff in your backpack you head to the faculty parking lot. Miss Williams is waiting for you in her Tesla.

"Pretty nice car for a teacher, right?" She asks.

"Or for a hippy, you respond." You respond.

"So you have something against hippies, alright, I'll add that to the list. Get in, we're going."

"Alright, I'll just stop talking." You get into the passenger seat.

"Not a bad idea." You just sit there with your bag on your lap as she drives for about and hour.

"Here we are, my house." You look out to see a massive house, on the verge of being a mansion. "Also, not bad for a teacher's. Let's go in."

You follow her into her house but she stops you in the entrance, "wait right here." You wait as she goes up stairs. This entryway is very elegant, it has a high quality embroidered bench, and paintings above the doors. After a long wait Miss Williams returns, "Go upstairs to the room on the right, and get changed."

"But I don't have any clothes with me." You respond.

"You'll understand once you are up there." She responds mysteriously. This is getting seriously weird you think. But you do what she says and find yourself in a very feminine room with an outfit laid on the bed.

"What do you mean, 'meet up with Sarah again.'" You ask, already knowing the answer.

"I know about your affair," she says, "and it's going to end. I have evidence and if you go out I'm sending it to Mom."

Your wife's prestige helped you get where you are in business and a divorce could hurt you financially, not to mention that you want to stay with her. At least Emma doesn't appear to know who Sarah is.

"Oh and put this on if you don't want Sarah's husband to know." She clearly knows Sarah's married to your boss and you take the bag, inside is...
1531.title: Cheat on her mother

info.brief_description: You've done something wrong, time to be punished.

Rules:
The cross dressing is a punishment for some offence or perceived offence.
The characters are attracted to girls but can be forced to have relationships with guys.
The characters do not enjoy acting as girls.
No magic and only very minor sci-fi.
No toilet play.
